feed.title: Matukane and Associates
feed.subtitle: Matukane and Associates' mission is to package the individual shareholdersâ€™ many years of experience in the industry in the Engineering and related Scientific Consulting, Project- and Environmental Management over the wide fields of Municipal Services, Governmental Management, Business Development and -Management, Teaching, Training and Mentoring, into a mutually beneficial business entity to better service particularly in the Water Services field in the Public Sector.
